text:
view in browser URL is not at all related to what campaign you assign an email to. It is completely based on if you have the web version toggled on.

You could theoretically disable it in the page using HubL by checking the URL if the URL exists in HubL donâ€™t display it

hello! yes, it's toggle on right now on the page. My question is, why does it still show up even when i'm already viewing it in the browser. In this drag and drop email, there isn't seem to be an option to override it in hubl.
